banner.title: EMS Contarting
banner.text: Delivering first-class commercial maintenance nation wide 24/7

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Welcome to EMS Contracting
about.text: EMS Contracting, founded in 2013 by Mick Donkin and Kris Armstrong then later joined by key director Daryl Shepherd,incorporates 3 divisions - Metering, Renewables and Recycling.

services_link.text: You will be satisfy with our work contact us today & help is on the way

Contactus.title: Get in
Contactus.text: Services from us are trusted, reliable and professional. Please fill out the form completely, and we will get back to you as soon as possible

footer.loaction: EMS, Unit 19, City Road,  Inner man Street,Switzerland, SR5 2BN
footer.author: WebCoder
